name: Delee
headline: Blood testing device for early diagnosis of cancer and treatmentâ¦
description: Delee is a medical device company that developed a blood-testing device for early diagnosis of cancer and treatment monitoring through the isolation and analysis of the circulating tumor cells.

founders.name: Liza Velarde, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and acting CEO at Delee Corp. Velarde has been responsible for the development and execution of the company's strategic plans. Velarde's outstanding work has been highly regarded by international institutions such as Cartier Women's Initiative Awards and WeXchange (from the Inter-American Development Bank).  She also lead and supervised the development of the Zen FluidicsTM scientific line, a group of products that enables researchers to develop their own microfluidic applications.

founders.name: Juan Felipe Yee De LeÃ³n, Founder

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_0c429437c13f4e9a9118ed35889e7cb5f000.jpg/v1/fill/w_1080,h_519,al_c,q_85,usm_0.33_1.00_0.00,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_0c429437c13f4e9a9118ed35889e7cb5f000.jpg)
![DSC05185 ed proportions extend.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_d23537ba8ab141c3adbd1570c48ac940~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_980,h_578,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_d23537ba8ab141c3adbd1570c48ac940~mv2.jpg)
### Enabling high performance isolation of CTCs
### Meet the perfect duo for isolating and analyzing circulating tumor cells
Big problems require clever solutions. The CytoCatch™ technology was specifically designed to capture and analyze CTCs with the highest standards of efficiency and reproducibility, in a fully automated way.
![DSC05185 ed less long.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_78f214f187c143bc865dacfce97e0482~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_52,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_78f214f187c143bc865dacfce97e0482~mv2.png)
### MEET THE PERFECT DUO
FOR ISOLATING AND ANALYZING CIRCULATING TUMOR CELLS
Big problems require clever solutions. The CytoCatch™ technology was specifically designed to capture and analyze CTCs with the highest standards of efficiency and reproducibility, in a fully automated way/manner/fashion.
### Reliable, reproducible and fully automated isolation of CTCs
The CytoCatch™ isolation device has outstanding recovery rates, above 97% when using multiple cancer cell lines from prostate, breast, lung, and colorectal cancer. That, along with the fact that the platform is fully automated, which increases the reliability and reproducibility of CTC isolation by preventing human errors and cell loss due to manual steps. makes it the ideal tool for the complicated task of efficiently separating blood cancer cells
[READ MORE](http://www.delee.co/<https:/www.delee.co/isolation>)
![DSC05852 ed new flipbis homog.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_9c021e76665943a281088e5b8f789251~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_490,h_668,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_9c021e76665943a281088e5b8f789251~mv2.png)
![DSC05888 ED proportionsbis homog.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_7e4e3c1bbacf463cb8cb6e4f13ada3d5~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_123,h_100,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_7e4e3c1bbacf463cb8cb6e4f13ada3d5~mv2.png)
### Classify and enumerate accurately CTCs in your sample
The CytoCatch™ imaging system has advanced computer vision and machine learning algorithms to scan large non-flat areas and accurately classify the CTCs isolated from your sample. The components of this device, including objectives, fluorescent filter cubes, and LEDs, are fully customizable, giving you the flexibility to customize your experiments to your needs.
[READ MORE](http://www.delee.co/<https:/www.delee.co/imaging>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_198e0494f4fb4e12b474aefba3311c92f000.jpg/v1/fill/w_141,h_94,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_198e0494f4fb4e12b474aefba3311c92f000.jpg)
#### Push the boundaries of your research 
Create your own antibody panels. Choose the antibodies, fluorophores, and staining strategies that work better for you, without any restrictions. The CytoCatch™ technology adapts to your requirements and gives you the freedom to construct your own protocols and work with rare cells of different origin. 
[READ MORE](http://www.delee.co/<https:/www.delee.co/imaging>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/082c58_ffe06ccc544740ae9d2938869cf0bf0cf000.jpg/v1/fill/w_122,h_68,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/082c58_ffe06ccc544740ae9d2938869cf0bf0cf000.jpg)
#### Break the barrier of CTC enumeration 
Go beyond CTC enumeration. The captured cells are compatible with traditional molecular biology techniques and next generation sequencing technologies, enabling the performance of molecular analyses to assess their genetic characteristics.
[READ MORE](http://www.delee.co/<https:/www.delee.co/isolation>)

generated_description:
**Delee: Revolutionizing Cancer Detection with Blood Testing Technology**

Founded in 2017 and based in Monterrey, Mexico, Delee is a pioneering medical device company on a mission to transform early cancer diagnosis and treatment monitoring. They leverage cutting-edge technology to isolate and analyze circulating tumor cells (CTCs), enabling more timely and accurate cancer detection.

As part of Y Combinator's Batch W17, Delee's small-but-mighty team of 18 is well-placed to harness innovation in the diagnostics space. Their flagship products are the **CytoCatch™ Isolation Platform** and the **CytoCatch™ Imaging System**. These devices stand out for their fully automated processes, promising outstanding recovery rates—over 97%—when isolating CTCs from various cancer types, including prostate, breast, lung, and colorectal cancers.

### Key Features
- **CytoCatch™ Isolation Platform**: This innovative device excels in the reliable and reproducible isolation of CTCs, completely removing human error from the equation. It’s designed for high efficiency, making it an ideal solution for researchers and clinicians alike.
  
- **CytoCatch™ Imaging System**: This platform employs sophisticated computer vision and machine learning algorithms to accurately classify isolated CTCs. It's fully customizable, allowing researchers to tweak the components to better suit their experiments.

Delee aims to push the limits of cancer research by offering customizable antibody panels and compatibility with modern molecular biology techniques, including next-generation sequencing. They’re not just isolating cells; they’re enabling an entirely new frontier in understanding cancer at the genetic level. 

In a landscape that's often bogged down by complexity, Delee sets itself apart with a clear vision: leveraging technology to tackle one of the most daunting challenges in healthcare—cancer. For anyone interested in early cancer diagnosis or working at the intersection of technology and medicine, Delee is definitely a name to follow. 

To learn more about their offerings, you can visit their website at [Delee.co](http://www.delee.co).
